title: Ka Chhandamtu chu zuiin
lyrics:
Ka Chhandamtu chu zuiin,
He hla hi ka sa-
A hming ropui ber awh se;
Hmangaih vangin min rawn zawng,
A thisenin min lei,
A hming ropui ber rawh se.

'Haleluia, chatuan Lalpa,
Ropui ber se' tih hi
Ka kumkhaw hla chu a ni;
Ka Chhandamtu, aw ka Tlantu,
Mi sual Tlantu ropui ber rawh se;
A nun ka tan a phal a,
Ka chhandam nan a thi,
A hming ropui ber rawh se.

Thim hnuaiah leh ka chauhvin,
Min enkawl fo va,
A hming ropui ber rawh se;
Hlauhna leh chak lohnaah,
Aman min thlamuan ang,
A hming ropui ber rawh se.

Ka kianga kalin, min veng-
In min thlamuan ang;
A hming ropui ber rawh se;
Jordan lui min hruai kai ang,
Vanah khian min thlen ang,
A hming ropui ber rawh se.
